## SeriesSpec type

Specifies input to the plot function for a single data series. Can be an array of values or an ISeriesSpec object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type SeriesSpec = ValueArray | ISeriesSpec;
```
<b>References:</b> [ValueArray](./plot.valuearray.md)<!-- -->, [ISeriesSpec](./plot.iseriesspec.md)
